item.description:
Weekend of Nov 14th Toys N Things is the date of a special pre-release event for the newest edition of Fantasy Flight Games' Warhammer Fantasy Roleplay. The newest WFRP features a new storytelling system with 4 new rulebooks, over 30 dice, 30 different careers, and 300 cards.
"A Day Late, A Shilling Short" is a special adventure designed so players can explore the new system. Toys N Things will be running "A Day Late, A Shilling Short" on Saturday the 14th at 1pm and again at 5pm. Players can also check out the new books and other new game materials. If you'd like to learn more about the edition of WFRP please visit: http://www.fantasyfli...
item.name: WFRP Pre-Release and Meetup at Toys N Things
